infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The app needs access to your camera to allow you to take photos for your profile or scan QR codes for accessing content.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ur app needs access to your photo library to allow you to upload profile pictures, share images, and enhance your experience. For example, you can select and upload a profile photo to personalize your account.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: The app requires microphone access to allow you to record audio for video content and voice messages.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: The app needs access to your contacts to help you find and connect with friends within the app.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
